comments.comment: 15:40 I haven't been this happy in, at least 6 years.   First, my wife, the love of my life died from a brain aneurism. Now, I'm on a 6-12 month clock due to pancreatic cancer.   I wish I was healthy enough to carry out some of my bucket list. I'm depressed to be checking out early. But happy I will be with my love again when it happens.  Watching these types of videos, are my only way of escaping my situation. And seeing moments like this, with people so happy, gives me such joy.  Live your life, for those who can't. I love you all.
